memories.content: Waves 1-10 COMPLETE (2026-01-14, commit f8381ce). Backend APIs, Market/Reporting, React Query, 18 UI components, E2E testing (258 Playwright), Performance, Security (RBAC, token blacklist, eval() RCE fix), LazyImage, usePrefetch, React.memo, VirtualList. Tests: 337 frontend + 1055 backend.

conda env: /home/mattb/miniconda3/envs/dashboard-backend. Backend port 8000, Frontend port 5173. Git: stash apply over pop, don't push unless asked. User prefers validation/testing before new features. No agent swarms for sequential dependent tasks. Be extremely clear about what actions user needs to take; state clearly if no action needed. User prefers directness over hedging. Dashboard purpose: comprehensive deal intelligence platform tracking ALL deals pursued (not just owned). Two currently owned deals: Cabana on 99th (Glendale, AZ) and Tempe Metro (Tempe, AZ). '4) Closed Deals' = currently owned, '5) Realized Deals' = sold/disposed. Do NOT expand extraction filter to older UW Model versions — different layouts would produce errors. Future task: group models by version for separate extraction.

pydantic-settings 2.x: CORS_ORIGINS must be JSON array. Single .env in project root, symlinked from backend/.env. Shell env var SHAREPOINT_SITE_URL overrides .env with truncated value - MUST unset shell var before running extraction. DB: PostgreSQL localhost:5432/dashboard_interface_data (NOT SQLite — dashboard.db is 0 bytes). Cell reference file: Underwriting_Dashboard_Cell_References.xlsx in project root. VITE_API_URL fix: src/lib/config.ts always appends /api/v1 to base URL; api.ts imports API_URL from config.ts as single source of truth. Email domain: bandrcapital.com (NOT brcapital.com).

EXTRACTION COMPLETE (2026-02-02): 28/28 files extracted, 0 failures, 52.8s total. 26 unique properties with extraction data + 3 monitored files with no extraction data (Casitas at San Marcos, Cortland Arrowhead Summit, Town Center Apartments). Avg success rate 67.1%, avg 771 real values per file. 1,169 fields per property across 11 categories. Extraction API: 18 endpoints. Filters: FILE_PATTERN=.*UW.*Model.*vCurrent.*, CUTOFF_DATE=2024-07-15. 28 files pass (23 dead, 5 initial_review), 253 skipped. Scheduler: twice daily (cron 0 2,14 * * *), file monitor polls SharePoint every 30 min. Both in app/main.py lifespan. extracted_values columns: id, extraction_run_id, property_id, property_name, field_name, field_category, sheet_name, cell_address, value_text, value_numeric, value_date, is_error, error_category, source_file, created_at, updated_at.

DATA FOUNDATION REBUILT FROM EXTRACTION (2026-02-02). Previous fabricated seed data replaced with real extraction-derived data. Phase 1 (seed script rewrite): 30 properties (28 from monitored_files + 2 manual closed deals), 30 deals with correct stages (23 dead, 5 initial_review, 2 closed), 28 documents (UW model files), 2 transactions (closed deals only), 29,225 extracted_values linked to properties via property_id. financial_data JSON column stores nested frontend fields (acquisition, financing, returns, operations, expenses, exit, physical). Phase 2 (API transformation): _to_frontend_property() converts flat DB rows to nested Property TypeScript interface. New endpoints: GET /properties/dashboard (nested list), GET /properties/dashboard/{id} (nested single), GET /properties/summary (portfolio stats). Frontend API client updated to use /properties/dashboard. Phase 3 (email fix): brcapital.com→bandrcapital.com across 16 files (backend source, config, tests, frontend, docs). Phase 4 (DB model): Added latitude, longitude, building_type, financial_data columns to Property model + alembic migration 8e6fdd43a452. TypeScript clean, Vite build succeeds. User about to review dashboard with real data.
